title: Notice
content:
wffweb-3.0.2 is released, upgrade your project now. It contains lot of major improvements for multi-threading environment.

We have verified the stability of wffweb-3.0.2 in our production project.
We are not getting enough donations/profits to maintain this framework so we are planning for a commercial version of this framework. If you would like to donate please contact tech-support@webfirmframework.com.
